Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Homeless youth - Australia
description: A dramatised recreation concerning the plight of a homeless teenage boy who has turned to prostitution in order to survive. Set in Sydney's King Cross area the story tells of the efforts of some high school children to help him and attempts to explain the pressures that can cause a child to get into this situation. Financed by various companies and organisations in Sydney.
